data.text:
In collaboration with Caribbean Public Health Agency (CARPHA), your safety is our #1 priority.

🏖️ Coming to the Caribbean is now healthier and safer! Visit our Caribbean Travellers’ Health App for all info you need to enjoy your Caribbean vacation! 👙🥥✈️

Reposted from @CARPHA1 https://t.co/Q6pFrorp1m

May/June issue of Caribbean Beat magazine visits some of the region's most tranquil hideaways from, Tobago to Carriacou to Dominica, and the stunning Blue Holes of the Bahamas. Plus coverage of Caribbean music, culture, fashion, and more!  https://t.co/hALok0yXow
#iflycaribbean https://t.co/QC0UBYjgis

Happy National Tourist Appreciation Day! We can’t wait to connect you with sand, sea and sun with flights from New York to Kingston with onward connections to Barbados/Nassau, as well as flights between Barbados and Grenada/Ogle #iflycaribbean #iamcaribbean

📷 @thetrinitraveller https://t.co/39KRuSD4sC
